thread.title: With Cubs advancing, spotlight shines on Wrigley
thread.title_full: With Cubs advancing, spotlight shines on Wrigley

author: ANDREW SELIGMAN
title: With Cubs advancing, spotlight shines on Wrigley
text:
Nam Y. Huh With Cubs advancing, spotlight shines on Wrigley 
Chicago Cubs pitcher Kyle Hendricks arrives at Wrigley Field for a team workout in preparation for Tuesday's Game 3 in baseball's National League Championship Series against the New York Mets, Monday, Oct. 19, 2015, in Chicago. (AP Photo/Nam Y. Huh) Posted: Tuesday, October 20, 2015 2:43 am With Cubs advancing, spotlight shines on Wrigley Associated Press | 
CHICAGO (AP) — Will Byington sat at the counter in the Starbucks across Addison Street from Wrigley Field editing pictures on a laptop. 
A freelance photographer, his work lines the walls. One of his favorite subjects? Of course, it's the ballpark.
